content: make your own crochet maple leaf with my easy step by step written tutorial the sign of the arrival of autumn make your crochet leaf into a garland add to a seasonal wreath or use as colourful crochet coasters crochet pattern includes step by step written / photo instructions showing you how to easily make your own crochet maple leaf in a few steps make crochet maple leaf with any yarn from your stash & the matching crochet hook this pattern uses more advanced stitches and it ideal for an advanced crocheter pattern made using any yarn size of your choice with crochet hook to match your yarn size the pattern is written in us terms and includes conversion table in uk terms skill level advanced beginner projects using yarn with basic stitches slip_stitch chain single_crochet half_double_crochet & double_crochet and simple shaping and finishing this pattern is copyright moara crochet © if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished product as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer and provide a link to my etsy shop if you re selling online thank you roseanna
